application.name: 打印爱情
application.ability: 打印爱情，输出美好的回忆
application.description: 打印爱情，输出美好的回忆
application.author: 柒.柒.源.码

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tim_print_love` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img1` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img2` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img3` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img4` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img5` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `text_img6` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `vedio_link` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `share_icon` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `share_content` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
